header.name: comment
header.comment: The Retail cube is a summary of the detail held in the Finance cube namely across some key retail measures.

extract.name: ex-Jedox [Cube]: Fin
extract.comment: Extract from cube fin to load into Retail

extract.name: Store [Attr]
extract.query: SELECT VProfCen.ProfCen, VProfCen.Description, VProfCen.ProCenTy, VProfCen.BusDiv, VProfCen.LegEnt, VProfCen.State, VProfCen.Country, VProfCen.Area, VProfCen.StoreType, VProfCen.SCapex, VProfCen.Grading, VProfCen.OpenDate, VProfCen.CloseDate, VProfCen.RefStartDate, VProfCen.RefEndDate, VProfCen.BOpenDate, VProfCen.BCloseDate, VProfCen.BRefStartDate, VProfCen.BRefEndDate, VProfCen.FOpenDate, VProfCen.FCloseDate, VProfCen.FRefStartDate, VProfCen.FRefEndDate FROM PAS_DWH.dbo.VProfCen VProfCen

extract.name: ex-Jedox [Cube]: Retail (Z-Out: Forecast_Mmm)
ex-Jedox [Cube]: Retail (Z-Out: Financials Load)
extract.comment: Z-Out process for AP21 Entities: This process will extract the retail cube for loaded values from Fin Cube.

extract.name: ex-Jedox [Attr]: Parameters (Variable)
extract.comment: Used as a general purpose extract where defines the Year for each process: 1- The Years are defined in [Cube]:#Parameter 2- Each process will set a variable in relation to the purpose of that job (eg. 1- Z-Out Process for [Attr]:Parameter Cube where CurrYear and PrevYear exist 2- Filter a full extract from Financials to CY & PY 3- Filter BudYear for CompType Budgets)

extract.name: ex-Jedox [Cube]: Retail (Z-Out: CY - LY)
extract.comment: Extract from "Cube:[Retail]" used to Zero out "Comp type". Note this is only from Retail. Used for zero out since Manual Load shall not be Z-Out at any time

extract.name: ex-Jedox [Cube]: Retail (Financials Load)
extract.comment: Extract from [cube]:Retail>Comp Type>Financial Load ,and spread out against the actual comp types,

extract.name: ex-Jedox [Cube]: Retail (Manual Load)
extract.comment: Extract from [cube]:Retail>Comp Type>Manuall Load ,and spread out against the actual comp types,

extract.name: ex-Jedox [Attr]: Parameters (Forecast_Mmm)
extract.comment: Used as a general purpose extract where defines the Year for each process: 1- The Years are defined in [Cube]:#Parameter 2- Each process will set a variable in relation to the purpose of that job (eg. 1- Z-Out Process for [Attr]:Parameter Cube where CurrYear and PrevYear exist 2- Filter a full extract from Financials to CY & PY 3- Filter BudYear for CompType Budgets)

extract.name: ex-Jedox [Cube]: Retail (Budget Copy)
extract.comment: Extract of Budget Year and Budget Version for Budget Copy

extract.name: ex-Jedox [Attr]: Parameters (Variable CurrYear)
extract.comment: Used as a general purpose extract where defines the Year for each process: 1- The Years are defined in [Cube]:#Parameter 2- Each process will set a variable in relation to the purpose of that job (eg. 1- Z-Out Process for [Attr]:Parameter Cube where CurrYear and PrevYear exist 2- Filter a full extract from Financials to CY & PY 3- Filter BudYear for CompType Budgets)

extract.name: ex-Jedox [Attr]: Parameters (Variable Bud Year)
extract.comment: Used as a general purpose extract where defines the Year for each process: 1- The Years are defined in [Cube]:#Parameter 2- Each process will set a variable in relation to the purpose of that job (eg. 1- Z-Out Process for [Attr]:Parameter Cube where CurrYear and PrevYear exist 2- Filter a full extract from Financials to CY & PY 3- Filter BudYear for CompType Budgets)

extract.name: ex-Jedox [Cube]: Fin - For DW
extract.comment: Extract from cube fin to load into Retail

extract.name: Duplicate of ex-Jedox [Cube]: Fin
extract.comment: Extract from cube fin to load into Retail

extract.name: Store [By Area Manager]

transform.name: tr-FT [Cube]: Retail (Fcst2Fcst_Mmm)
transform.comment: The alien creatures "Curr Year" is eliminated from this stage and the version is changed to Forcast_mmm. Cool Stuff

transform.name: tr-TJ [Dim]: Store
transform.comment: Joins two hierarchies under one parent

transform.name: tr-TJ [Cube]: Retail (Z-Out: Financials Load)
transform.comment:
Z-Out process to merge the entities with the following flags: Financials load & CurrYear & PrevYear
** set the ParameterYear in variables from [Cube]:#_Parameter (default: CurrYear|PrevYear) **

transform.name: tr-TJ [Cube]: Retail (Non-LegacyStore)
transform.comment: Joins two hierarchies under one parent

transform.name: tr-TJ [Cube]: Retail (CY - PY)
transform.comment:
Filter the load for Non-LegacyStore based on CY & PY
** set the ParameterYear in variables from [Cube]:#_Parameter (default: CurrYear|PrevYear) **

transform.name: tr-FT [Cube]: Retail ()
transform.comment: Account mapping is happening in "Account_Input"

function.name: Account_Input
function.comment: Mapping from Financials [Dim]:Account to Retail [Dim]:Retail Measures - Cause the names are different. Changes to Accounts should be map/edit here.

transform.name: tr-TJ [Cube]: Retail (Z-Out: Fcst_Mmm) 0
transform.comment: Filter the load for Non-LegacyStore based on variable ParameterYear which is set to CurrYear at the top Job level.

transform.name: tr-TJ [Cube]: Retail (Fcst2Fcst_Mmm)
transform.comment:
Filter the load for Non-LegacyStore based on CY & PY
** set the ParameterYear in variables from [Cube]:#_Parameter (default: CurrYear|PrevYear) **

transform.name: tr-FT [Cube]: Retail (Z-Out: CY - LY)
transform.comment: CY - LY Zero Out

transform.name: tr-TJ [Cube]: Retail (Z-Out: CY - LY)
transform.comment:
Join two tables of: CY-LY All stores with Calendar Curr-Prev to Zero out only the current and previous years.
** set the ParameterYear in variables from [Cube]:#_Parameter (default: CurrYear|PrevYear) **

transform.comment: Lookup "[Element]:Comp Type CurrentYear" from [Cube]:Store Calendar in order to load the

transform.comment: Lookup "[Element]:Comp Type CurrentYear" from [Cube]:Store Calendar in order to load the

Filter the load for CY & PY
** set the ParameterYear in variables from [Cube]:#_Parameter (default: CurrYear|PrevYear) **

transform.comment:
Filter the load for CY & PY
** set the ParameterYear in variables from [Cube]:#_Parameter (default: CurrYear|PrevYear) **

transform.comment: Lookup "[Element]:Comp Type CurrentYear" from [Cube]:Store Calendar in order to load the

transform.comment: Lookup "[Element]:Comp Type CurrentYear" from [Cube]:Store Calendar in order to load the

transform.name: tr-TJ [Cube]: Retail (Z-Out: Fcst_Mmm) 1
transform.comment: Filter the load for Forecast_Mmm based on forecast version stored in [Cube]:#_Parameter:(Fmth)

transform.name: tf-FT [Cube]: Retail (Budget Copy)
transform.comment: Transforms the version of the budget copy from Budget to what ever the variable ${Budget Target Copy} is set to. To change the target change the version in the variable.

transform.name: tr-TJ [Cube]: Retail (Budget Year)
transform.comment:
Filter the load for Non-LegacyStore based on CY & PY
** set the ParameterYear in variables from [Cube]:#_Parameter (default: CurrYear|PrevYear) **

transform.name: tr-FT [Cube]: Retail (Budget Load)
transform.comment: Account mapping is happening in "Account_Input"

function.name: Account_Input
function.comment: Mapping from Financials [Dim]:Account to Retail [Dim]:Retail Measures - Cause the names are different. Changes to Accounts should be map/edit here.

Z-Out process to merge the entities with the following flags: Financials load & CurrYear & PrevYear

transform.comment: Lookup "[Element]:Comp Type CurrentYear" from [Cube]:Store Calendar in order to load the

Filter the load for CY & PY

load.name: ld-Jedox [Cube]: Retail (Z-Out: Financials Load )
load.comment: Deletes Financials load for CY & PY as in #_Parameter (A join of two tables created in order to Z-Out)

load.name: ld-Jedox [Cube]: Retail (Budget Copy)
load.comment: Second step in the budget copy process Copies the Budget to the Budget target version (as defined in the variable Budget Copy Target) for the budget year (as defined in the variable BudgetYear).

load.name: ld-Jedox [Cube]: Retail (Budget Copy Z-Out)
load.comment: First step in the budget copy process Zeros out the Budget target version (as defined in the variable Budget Copy Target) for the budget year (as defined in the variable BudgetYear).

load.name: ld-Jedox [Cube]: Retail (Z-Out: Financials Load - Budget Load)
load.comment: Deletes Financials load for CY & PY as in #_Parameter (A join of two tables created in order to Z-Out)

job.name: [01-01]-load[Dim]:Store
job.comment: This job runs two extracts from the Jedox [Dim]: Profit/Cost Center , joins them and loads them into [Dim]:Store

job.name: [02-00]-load[Cube]:Retail(FinancialsLoad_All:_Actual_Forecast)
job.comment: Load actuals and forecast from the Financials cube into the Retail cube. This job will be scheduled on a nightly basis and will only update Actual and Forecast versions.

job.name: [02-00]-load[Cube]:Retail(FinancialsLoad_All:_Budget)
job.comment: Load Version:Budget* from the Finance cube into the Retail cube. This job will be run on demand. It can be run for different versions by changing the variable value.

execution.nameref: ld-Jedox [Cube]: Retail (Z-Out: Financials Load - Budget Load)

job.name: [03-00]-load[Cube]:Retail(CompType_All:_Actual_Forecastl)
job.comment: Master job for populating "Comp" values in the Retail Cube based on Comp Type CY and Comp Type LY in the Store Calendar Cube. This ETL populates Actual and Forecast values, for current and previous year only.

job.name: [03-00]-load[Cube]:Retail(CompType_All:_Budget)
job.comment: Master job for populating "Comp" values in the Retail Cube based on Comp Type CY and Comp Type LY in the Store Calendar Cube. This ETL populates BUDGET values, for budget year (set in #_Parameters cube) only, and is run on demand only!!!!!!! ---------------------------------------------------------------------- NOTES! - Version variable can be set for the appropriate working Budget version (e.g. Budget_1, Budget_2, etc...). - This ETL may return a warning if the future year Store Calender: Comp Type LY values do not exist. This is due to the fact that the rules used to calculate Comp Type LY values look forward. If the year does not exist, values returned are empty and hence the warning. The warning can be ignored or the year can added to the FYear dimension and #_FYear attribute (Next Year). - It is debatable whether Comp Type LY values need to be populated for Budget version. The "LY" jobs can be removed if required in future.

execution.nameref: ld-Jedox [Cube]: Retail (Z-Out: CY - LY) - Budget Load
ld-Jedox [Cube]: Retail (Manual Load) CY - Budget Load
ld-Jedox [Cube]: Retail (Manual Load) LY - Budget Load
ld-Jedox [Cube]: Retail (Financialsl Load) CY - Budget Load
ld-Jedox [Cube]: Retail (Financials Load) LY - Budget Load

job.name: Nightly
job.comment: Runs the load of retail ACTUAL and FORECAST data from the finance cube. Budget data is loaded "as required" and is not scheduled. 20141106 RKS

job.name: [99-00-01]-load[Cube]:Budget Copy
job.comment: Zeros out and then performs a copy using the Variables BudgetYear and Budget Target Version from the Budget version to the version set in Budget Target Version for the variable BudgetYear.
